entry.title: $2700 // NO FEE~RENO~DW~BRIGHT~SS~PETS WELCOMED~SUBWAY~LIVE IN SUPER
entry.content:
Fully renovated, beautiful 1 bedroom apt just 3 flights up in excellent upper east side location. New kitchen with new appliances including a dishwasher and new cabinetry with abundant storage. The unit is open and sunny with a nice size living room, high ceilings and new hardwood floors throughout. The bedroom fits a queen bed and the renovated bathroom has a soaking tub and shower, good storage and a medicine cabinet. The building rarely has availability, it is spotless and extremely well maintained (new hallways and floors) and loved by tenants. There is a great super and a front door buzzer.

Email/call/text to schedule showing asap as this one won't last!

entry.title: $2700 // NO FEE~KING Bd~Elevator~Live in Super~DW~Laundry~Bright~PETS OK!
entry.content:
Sun-Drenched TOP FLOOR TRUE XL Yorkville Gem + Home Office Area**KING size BR*Laundry; Elevator; Live-in Super, Pet-Friendly!

Step into this TOP FLOOR, SUN-FILLED nicely renovated Yorkville TRUE 1bedroom 1bathroom gem/ also considered a JUNIOR-4 that features glowing hardwood floors, a HOME OFFICE AREA/DEN, DINING ALCOVE, a separate kitchen with full size appliances, custom cabinetry, DISHWASHER, and ample counter space. The unit also has a large bedroom that can accommodate a king size bed with furniture, and there is ample closet space throughout. Both the living room and bedroom also contains updated A/C units as well.

Nestled in a well maintained pre-war building with a live-in super, LAUNDRY ROOM with updated washers and dryers, ELEVATOR, and voice intercom system. The unit is also surrounded by an abundance of terrific eateries, trendy cafes, major transportation subway 6, Q, M15 bus services, Whole Foods, Fairway and so much more.


Don't miss this opportunity and schedule now for a private showing! This one will go fast!

Please call/text/email

entry.title: $2295 // Massive One bed U.E.S. 4,6,6 trains
entry.content: Immaculate, large SUN-SPLASHED rare corner-unit KING SIZED one bedroom features pristine renovation from top to bottom, separate windowed galley kitchen, stainless steel stove, modern counter tops, generous cabinetry, and space-saving inset full sized refrigerator. Beautiful shiny hardwood floors and high ceilings throughout. Living room easily fits a sectional, coffee table, bookshelf and enough room for a small dining table. Great layout and immaculate finishes, plenty of sun in an Italian inspired impeccably maintained building with a marble lobby right off Third Avenue and only 3 blocks from the 4/5/6 trains. For your convenience there is a dry cleaners right downstairs, attached to the building! Cats OK (no dogs). Call or text
